data.name: Welcome Back To 2007 2 Director's Cut
data.detailed_description:
Special Offer

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2003220/


About the Game

Welcome Back To 2007 2 Director's Cut


■ Three new locations after the end of the main game;
■ New Boss and a new type of Enemies;
■ Story extension and the true ending;
■ New cutscene;
■ Redesigned some textures and models;
■ Completely Uncensored;
■ Quick access to new locations from the level selection menu;
■ Original, higher difficulty than the main game;
■ One new, final Achievement - total 100.

data.short_description: Welcome Back To 2007 2 Director's Cut. Three new Locations, a new Boss and new Enemies. Augmented plot and real ending! Uncensored! +1 Achievement!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel / AMD 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 620
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Required: Keyboard, Mouse. Supported: 1280x720/1920x1080/2560x1440, 60Hz fullscreen

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Welcome Back To 2007 2 Director's Cut

content_descriptors.notes: In this DLC, there is a drawing similar to the external female genital organs. Also in the DLC there is a boss, outwardly schematically similar to the male genital organ.
